page.title: 15OUT OF SCHOOL
page.content: When we go home Harthill is full of people playing and going to discos. We go to the Park and we play on the swings. We go up to the BMX track and have races. At 7 o'clock we go to the Youth Club and play table tennis and pool or go in the disco. We take Â£1 andget pop and crisps, take some records and play them at the disco. Vandals get marker pens and write their names on slides, roundabouts, swings and seats, and the clinic. Some of the older ones start fires. Someone has taken two planks of wood off the seats and put them on the swings. Litter is a bit of a problem in Harthill specially in some parts, like the play area. Recently all the classes in our school have been out in the village collecting litter.
